title: What other courses can I pursue along with mcom? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since you’re pursuing a Masters’ Degree; you must opt for a course that can give a push start to your career. However mcom studies doesn’t help much in finding a career oriented job. But since we gain knowledge in Commerce Stream, BFSI can be a lucrative carrer option. Private Banks are planning to take and absorb more than 7 Laks of Job opportunities in next 5 years. At this moment, searching for a course that aids you gain knowledge about Industry know-how and its’ meticulous processes can help in getting that push start and performing well. Before opting for such Banking Course you may keep following things in Mind: The roots of the InstituteCourse Structure and ContentMethod of deliveryModules they cover and Duration of CoursePlacementsIdeally such courses in Banking are finished in a time span of 2–3 Months followed by Campus Placements.
According to me, you should try preparing for SSC CGL and UGC NET. SSC can get you a good govt job while Net is the eligibility  for lectureship.
